StoryElement.StoryElement: [Robby enters his room at the Ryoukan.]
Robby: Whoa this is unbelievable! Sliding doors . . . Tatami floors . . . I better check those closets to make sure there aren’t any ninjas. Oh, wow what’s that? Oh, it’s a telephone.
[Robby sees a small refrigerator.]
Robby: What kind of goodies do they have in here? [opens it up] A month’s supply of beer and sake! Nice! Maybe I’ll have a cold one before I jump into the hot spring. Wait a minute.

This must be the mini bar. They probably charge you a fortune just like in the states. But on the other hand: This is the land of hospitality. You don’t even have to tip your waiter here. Besides, just one wouldn’t hurt.
[Robby cracks open a beer. At the same time there’s a knock at the door.]
I’m coming!
[Robby opens the door. It’s Mariko.]
MARIKO: Hi, Robby! How do you like your room?
ROBBY: I love it!
MARIKO: I forgot to tell you something. They change the baths after 6:00pm.
ROBBY: They have one of those “Danger: Wet Floor” signs in English and Spanish? I’ll be alright. I’ll just wait outside until they’re finished.
MARIKO: No. I mean, the woman’s bath and the men’s bath will switch. The women will go in the men’s bath and the men will go in the women’s bath.
ROBBY: I’m not sure, but I think I want to live here for the rest of my life.
MARIKO: No, they will still be separate.

StoryInteraction.StoryInteraction: But as a favor to me you’re letting me go into the women’s bath.

StoryElement.StoryElement: ROBBY: I’m just a man who wants to soak in scalding hot mineral water.
MARIKO: Then take this!
ROBBY: Aaah, a treasure map.

MARIKO: No, this is the sign for men and this is the sing for women in Japanese Kanji. This is your sign. Can you make a note of it? When you use the baths after 6:00 enter the one with this sign on it. Got it?
ROBBY: OK! No problem.
MARIKO: Are you sure you don’t want to make a note of it? Use my pen, write it down.

StoryInteraction.StoryInteraction: Mariko, I’m fine. I have a good memory. This means ‘men’ right?

StoryResponse.StoryResponse: MARIKO: Here you are. [Robby tries to write. The pen is out of ink.] Oh shoot. Just don’t forget OK. I gotta go.
MARIKO: OK, just don’t forget. I have to run.

StoryElement.StoryElement: ROBBY: Thanks.
[Robby puts the note in his pocket.]
I wonder if they have one of those crazy Japanese games on TV?
[Another knock at the door.]
Maybe Junko?
[Robby opens the door. There’s a beautiful girl standing there.]

StoryResponse.StoryResponse: AI: Do we all look alike to you? My name is Ai.

StoryElement.StoryElement: ROBBY: Hi, my name is . . .
AI: Robby . . . I know. Junko said I could wait here for her. Can I come in?

StoryInteraction.StoryInteraction: Uh, yeah. Would you like a beer?
Uh, yeah. Would you like to watch TV?

StoryResponse.StoryResponse: AI: Are you drinking? I’ll have one too.

StoryElement.StoryElement: ROBBY: OK. One more coming right up.
AI: I have to warn you. When I drink I get a little crazy.
